name: Kim Ho-joong
description: '''Kim Ho-joong''' ({{Korean|hangul=김호중}}; born October 2, 1991) is a South Korean [[classical crossover]] singer. He came to prominence after a fourth-place finish in [[TV Chosun]] show ''[[Mr. Trot]]''. During his military service, he served as a public service worker and was discharged on June 9, 2022.
